author: Ануш М
title: Didn't like my stay at hotel, was feeling cheated
text: Awful, incompetent stuff. I had booked and payed a room for a one day only, then checked with the person in reception, she confirmed that I can have another room ,(view from my current room was not good​) if I book next day also. I booked it, did a payment and next morning clerk said me what my room can't be changed. Also in the 2nd day of stay room wasn't cleaned.I was filling cheated :(
